articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Wildfires in Turkey kill six, force tourists to flee by sea as blazes approach towns - ABC News
articles.description: About 100 Russian tourists are evacuated from Bodrum and people in Italy escape in dinghies as fires rage across southern Europe.
articles.content:
Panicked tourists in Turkey have hurried to rescue boats after being told to evacuate some hotels in the Aegean Sea resort town of Bodrum due to nearby wildfires.

articles.title: First software defined geostationary satellite in orbit - eeNews Europe
articles.description: The Eutelsat Quantum is the world’s first software defined satellite in a geostationary orbit and uses technology from SSTL in the UK
articles.content:
The worlds first geostationary satellite, developed by Surrey Satellites in the UK,  has been launched into orbit by ArianeSpace for European operator Eutelsat.
The launch marks the culmination of 3… [+4354 chars]
